summary: Shortly before his execution on the death row in San Quentin, amateur sleuth and baby photographer Ronnie Jackson, tells reporters how he got there.
cast: Bob Hope|Dorothy Lamour|Peter Lorre|Lon Chaney Jr.|John Hoyt|Charles Dingle|Reginald Denny|Frank Puglia|Ann Doran|Willard Robertson|Jack La Rue|Charles Arnt|Anthony Caruso|Jack Chefe|Jack Rube Clifford|Charles Cooley|Bing Crosby|Boyd Davis|Tom Dillon|Mike Donovan|Helena Phillips Evans|Betty Farrington|Budd Fine|James Flavin|Al Hill|Roland Soo Hoo|Brandon Hurst|Betty Hutton|Eddie Johnson|Richard Keene|Alan Ladd|George Lloyd|Matt McHugh|Clarence Muse|Garry Owen|James Pierce|Ted Rand|Joe Recht|Reginald Simpson|Brick Sullivan|Ray Teal|Harland Tucker|John Tyrrell|John Westley|Jean Wong
title: Morena y peligrosa
